content.en: Algorithmic network security: Researchers are exploring the use of various algorithms to improve security and performance in different types of networks. For example, the Monarch-Earthworm Algorithm is being tested for its effectiveness in securing IoT routing, while the REST-IDS algorithm aims to enhance intrusion detection in wireless sensor networks. Other algorithms, such as the Deep-reinforcement-learning-based intelligent routing scheme and the Modified LeNET architecture, are being developed to improve network performance and detect malicious nodes in specific network environments. These studies highlight the potential of algorithms to enhance the functionality and security of various networks.
content.da: Algoritmisk netværkssikkerhed: Forskere undersøger brugen af forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre sikkerheden og ydeevnen i forskellige typer netværk. For eksempel testes Monarch-Earthworm-algoritmen for dens effektivitet i at sikre IoT-routing, mens REST-IDS-algoritmen sigter mod at forbedre indtrængningsdetektering i trådløse sensornetværk. Andre algoritmer, såsom den dybde-forstærkning-læringsbaserede intelligente routing-skema og den modificerede LeNET-arkitektur, udvikles for at forbedre netværksydelsen og opdage ondsindede noder i specifikke netværksmiljøer. Disse studier fremhæver potentialet i algoritmer til at forbedre funktionaliteten og sikkerheden af forskellige netværk.
